metadata.title: CVE-2015-6748 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jsoup before 1.8.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjsoup-java - 1.10.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jsoup package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.2-2').
